docs.title: Get Started
docs.text:
Warning

tinydantic is currently a work in progress 🏗️

There's not much to see here yet, but feel free to grab your hard hat and have a look around! 👷

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
tinydantic is available on PyPI and can be installed with pip.

pip install tinydantic

docs.title: Reference
docs.text: Reference material for tinydantic, including auto-generated API documentation.

docs.title: tinydantic
docs.text:
tinydantic is a Python object-document mapper (ODM) for TinyDB.
